title: Jumanji [DVD]
creator_credit: Joe Johnston, William Teitler, Scott Kroopf and Tri-Star Pictures
brief_description: For 26 years Adrian Parrish has been trapped inside an ancient board game called Jumanji. The two children who release him also unwittingly unleash a group of wild jungle creatures who go on a rampage. Alan must save his hometown from destruction or risk being exiled back into the game. Cast includes Robin Williams as Adrian Parrish.
